h2_title: Where to Find the Commander Beetle
content: The Commander Beetle is an optional boss -- though hard to miss as you explore the Temple of Yellow Flowers. From the Forest of Ferocity Shrine, you need only make your way along the main path and up the stairs to find a large courtyard where the boss trains a group of several Sword Daoists.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Commander_Beetle.md", within the section "Commander Beetle" and the sub-section "Where to Find the Commander Beetle". The content is presented below:

The Commander Beetle is an optional boss -- though hard to miss as you explore the Temple of Yellow Flowers. From the Forest of Ferocity Shrine, you need only make your way along the main path and up the stairs to find a large courtyard where the boss trains a group of several Sword Daoists.
